Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Simultaneous impairment of other enzymes in the BS biosynthetic pathways may contribute to overall effects of EE on BS synthesis .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| BS deficiency (implied) |
| Enzyme impairment (implied, but not a specific disease) |

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases related to BS biosynthetic pathways. It only implies that there might be impairments in enzymes involved in BS synthesis, which could lead to BS deficiency.

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Simultaneous impairment of other enzymes in the BS biosynthetic pathways may contribute to overall effects of EE on BS synthesis .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| BS (Biotin Synthesis) |
| EE (Ethanolamine Ethyleneamine) |

There are no specific chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph other than Biotin Synthesis (BS) and Ethanolamine Ethyleneamine (EE). The paragraph is discussing the potential impact of Ethanolamine Ethyleneamine on Biotin Synthesis through the inhibition of other enzymes involved in the Biotin Synthetic pathways.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Biotin Synthesis (BS) |
| Ethanolamine Ethyleneamine (EE) |

The paragraph discusses the potential impact of Ethanolamine Ethyleneamine (EE) on Biotin Synthesis (BS) by impairing other enzymes in the Biotin Synthetic pathways. Both Biotin Synthesis and Ethanolamine Ethyleneamine are chemical entities.
